description: Triangle of Stirling numbers of first kind, s(n,n-k+1), n >= 1, 1<=k<=n. Also triangle T(n,k) giving coefficients in expansion of n!*C(x,n)/x in powers of x.
comments: n-th row of the triangle = charpoly of an (n-1)x(n-1) matrix with (1,2,3,...) in the diagonal and the rest zeros. [From _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 19 2009]_Daniel Forgues_, Jan 16 2016 (Start)For n >= 1, the row sums [of either signed or absolute values] are  Sum_{k=1..n} T(n,k) = 0^(n-1),  Sum_{k=1..n} |T(n,k)| = T(n+1,1) = n!. (End)
